items.name: XANA
items.introduction: {"time":1655803918323,"blocks":[{"id":"AxTfzevF7S","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"XANA is a layer 2 blockchain on Ethereum equipped with its own online social Metaverse. The symbiotic relationship between XANA’s network and Metaverse will allow both of them to compound each other’s utility. The best way to think of this is that any asset minted on XANA’s Metaverse will be represented on the XANA network as an NFT. Any applications made on the XANA network can be integrated into the XANA Metaverse."}},{"id":"TTt37FvzXu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"XANA has already managed to attract the attention of many major traditional firms with top-rated intellectual property (IP) brands. Additionally, XANA is also collaborating with several governments and some of the most popular Anime, Game and Clothing brands on the planet. The clothing brands will integrate their products onto the XANA Metaverse as Wearable NFTs such as clothes, accessories, and shoes. Governments will help design some of the infrastructure and environments on the land in XANA’s Metaverse."}},{"id":"Y0165dWl6t","type":"header","data":{"text":"Avatars and Wearables on XANA","level":2}},{"id":"TKZHhrRFkD","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Avatars can be equipped with many wearables such as clothes, shoes, and accessories. All the Wearables on XANA’s Metaverse are a great way to customize your avatars. They are also NFTs on the XANA blockchain."}},{"id":"wxflWdBJUf","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Since the XANA Metaverse and XANA blockchain are connected, users can seamlessly access all their Metaverse Wearables on the XANA blockchain and sell them as NFTs. On the flip side, anyone willing to buy NFTs for the XANA Metaverse can easily do so on the XANA blockchain, and those NFTs will seamlessly transfer over to the XANA Metaverse as Wearables."}},{"id":"oQVa8prB-e","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"XANA has attracted, and gained intellectual property (IP) access from popular Japanese Anime, Manga, and significant global shopping brands. All of these characters and many of the products from notable shopping brands will be available on the XANA Metaverse as wearable customizations that users can put on their avatars and display to other users on the XANA Metaverse. Additionally, buying these major characters or branded clothes as Wearables gives you ownership of them as an NFT on the XANA blockchain."}},{"id":"mKCoW24_VP","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/1_d765be43a4.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":150.75,"alt":"1.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/large_1_d765be43a4.png","hash":"large_1_d765be43a4","mime":"image/png","name":"large_1.png","path":null,"size":157.77,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/small_1_d765be43a4.png","hash":"small_1_d765be43a4","mime":"image/png","name":"small_1.png","path":null,"size":48.79,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/medium_1_d765be43a4.png","hash":"medium_1_d765be43a4","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_1.png","path":null,"size":97.72,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/thumbnail_1_d765be43a4.png","hash":"thumbnail_1_d765be43a4","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_1.png","path":null,"size":14.52,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"-ylyq1yq_T","type":"header","data":{"text":"Collaborative NFTs in XANA","level":2}},{"id":"0MUL0ritFL","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The ULTRAMAN NFT, is the first large scale collaboration for XANA’s ecosystem. The global renown Hero from Japan is now ready to be minted as XANA’s GameFi NFT and also avatar skin for the user."}},{"id":"IRqtxkFaxr","type":"header","data":{"text":"Land and NFTs on XANA","level":2}},{"id":"svwwCtSSCF","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Apart from Wearables, another type of asset class on the XANA Metaverse is Land. Users can use Land on XANA to host a whole heap of events and invite other users to their events. All the Land on XANA is also an NFT on the XANA blockchain."}},{"id":"kFl8viln1p","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Users can buy Land on the XANA blockchain using various cryptocurrencies such as $ETH, $BNB, & $MATIC, and then utilize that Land on the Metaverse to host a wide variety of social events. Since all the Land on the XANA Metaverse are NFTs, users can also easily sell it on the XANA blockchain for various cryptocurrencies."}},{"id":"K-CGXwWgd3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"World governments are also acquiring some of the Land on the XANA Metaverse to use it to create an infrastructure that will make moving around the Metaverse a lot more convenient and entertaining."}},{"id":"fbWGp5ReN6","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/2_bde09c3d54.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":279.76,"alt":"2.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/large_2_bde09c3d54.png","hash":"large_2_bde09c3d54","mime":"image/png","name":"large_2.png","path":null,"size":307.62,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/small_2_bde09c3d54.png","hash":"small_2_bde09c3d54","mime":"image/png","name":"small_2.png","path":null,"size":84.48,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/medium_2_bde09c3d54.png","hash":"medium_2_bde09c3d54","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_2.png","path":null,"size":177.97,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/thumbnail_2_bde09c3d54.png","hash":"thumbnail_2_bde09c3d54","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_2.png","path":null,"size":23.66,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"KNLxN0asiF","type":"header","data":{"text":"A New World on XANA","level":2}},{"id":"SaAAoaMARd","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"XANA is not just a social Metaverse or a layer 2 blockchain on Ethereum. XANA is the first project ever to seamlessly integrate a Metaverse onto a blockchain to create a fully symbiotic decentralized ecosystem. This new decentralized and symbiotic ecosystem that XANA is trying to make has the ability to truly scale and multiply the utility of the entire decentralized network with every new application, or asset that is added to it."}},{"id":"YxRpvNwx9s","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Popular publishers, major shopping brands, and even world governments have entered the world of XANA."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.excerpt: XANA is an EVM sidechain custom-built for the Metaverse. Compatible with all popular wallets, bridged with all major blockchains, and already adopted by the major institutions and global brands.
items.features_text: {"time":1655804340043,"blocks":[{"id":"ad6i5uzhCe","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1. NFT Purchase"}},{"id":"sPrmVyqo86","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"NFT purchases include Land, Avatars, Avatar wearables, game items, etc. Purchases are in credit cards or crypto from the platform."}},{"id":"NPmUX0ZjCw","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"2. NFT Launchpad"}},{"id":"BYxID3-4CG","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Limited NFT collaboration with Tops IPs and Brands are issued regularly, with the exclusive access for $XETA Staking users to participant for the prime whitelisting."}},{"id":"s_vHpgvL4j","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"3. Staked Game Play"}},{"id":"pOskeEdhz9","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"In XANA Native GameFi, Players can battle against friends or match up against others. These competition runs can be done with staked governance tokens. 2.5% fee applies on the winning pool."}},{"id":"srjEQUlMiQ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"4. Tournament Gaming"}},{"id":"Nml9UUbbR1","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Players can compete their performance on global and regional leaderboard of XANA ecosystem games. Tournament wins unlock unique skins and get a dedicated leaderboard. Participation in the tournament requires a ticket, purchases of which feed a prize pool, with the game taking 5% of all accrued ticket fees."}},{"id":"MBl7ZBimo8","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"5. NFT Marketplace"}},{"id":"dtD535Od4f","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"A 2.5% fee applies on all NFT trades on the Primary NFT marketplace XANALIA."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1655803960598,"blocks":[{"id":"WxMrnVHsy_","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The metaverse comes with plenty of lucrative opportunities, allowing people to generate steady income online from anywhere in the world"}},{"id":"JaXXGygVK2","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The metaverse revolution is upon us, garnering attention from tech giants and average users alike. Metaverse provides several ways of generating income online and trading digital assets with real-world value ."}},{"id":"mZfNiMLGvK","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"As unbelievable as it may sound, with the launch of the XANA metaverse, people will have plenty of revenue generation options from the comfort of their homes. In this article, we will discuss the top 5 ways you can make money in the immersive virtual world."}},{"id":"XFDMHP4_Yv","type":"header","data":{"text":"NFTs","level":2}},{"id":"jEsUow-cqt","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Until last year, we only saw NFTs exploding in the art sector, with CryptoPunk and Bored Ape Yacht Club showing an incredible price run. But in the XANA metaverse, these NFTs have the potential to be turned into wearable digital assets, and easily sold in NFT marketplaces that are integrated on the metaverse."}},{"id":"g7B3Esq2Tw","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Users can acquire avatars, virtual land, wearables, and equipment within the metaverse. All these digital assets in the metaverse are represented by NFTs so that their value is recorded on a blockchain, and this translates in real world value as well."}},{"id":"mpCIqv7EXu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"There are many strategies that XANA metaverse users can utilize to generate an income using NFTs on the metaverse. Users can trade NFTs on the metaverse as a means to make some profit, but this does carry some risk, and would require some initial capital. Another method that does not require any capital, and is almost risk free is just using your creativity to make wearable digital assets for the metaverse, and sell them as NFTs."}},{"id":"w6MvjmCc5d","type":"header","data":{"text":"Gaming","level":2}},{"id":"7siDEW3XgE","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"At the moment, gaming is the leading activity on metaverse environments, and they allow people to earn significant money through their play-to-earn ecosystems. Users can also trade in-game assets represented by NFTs at NFT Marketplaces for tokens that carry real world value."}},{"id":"ZZSaLVTwXX","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"By playing blockchain-based games in the metaverse, you can unlock achievements and get rewarded. You can also generate income by building games for others to play and enjoy in the metaverse."}},{"id":"4FupW9J5MR","type":"header","data":{"text":"Education","level":2}},{"id":"g1aKdA36N3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"With the pandemic forcing schools to shut down, the potential of virtual schooling has become more apparent than ever before. As the metaverse develops, it will become an increasingly immersive space that will make online education more interactive and personalized."}},{"id":"tdcc3svCXC","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"XANA metaverse allows educational institutions to set up a virtual school in the metaverse. The students will enjoy increased exposure to global instructors, carry out real-time chat, and interact with each other as avatars. The immersive learning experience will minimize the negative effects of remote schooling."}},{"id":"Pk7d_JyFMb","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Individual educators can set up their own learning facilities on the metaverse where they can charge their students to attend their seminars. Educators can charge their attendants in the form of tokens through an admission fee or sell NFT passes that will allow holders to attend their seminars."}},{"id":"zoLW94nKQ7","type":"header","data":{"text":"Fashion","level":2}},{"id":"LMvQtAN7qA","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Renowned fashion brands like Gucci and Louis Vuitton are experimenting with virtual clothing, introducing them as NFTs. Successful brand collaborations are also being carried out in the gaming sector with initiatives like Valentino x Animal Crossing and Burberry x Blankos Block Party."}},{"id":"6LnhHmS_DM","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Even if you don’t have a big name in the fashion industry, you can still create a clothing line of digital Wearable Assets for the avatars people have in the metaverse. You can come up with interesting creations and help your friends in customizing their avatars. All digital wearable assets on XANA are represented by NFTs on the XANA blockchain, which means they can be sold on NFT Marketplaces allowing you to earn big through your digital wearables."}},{"id":"OxRhop7gWo","type":"header","data":{"text":"Real Estate","level":2}},{"id":"dmYplZ_2Dr","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Lately, virtual real estate has seen a massive boom, with a craze amongst people to seek digital land in notable metaverses like The Sandbox and Decentraland. Virtual plots in prominent locations have a lot of value and can help owners strike a jackpot."}},{"id":"bc_iMsLkVS","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"There are many ways to earn through virtual real estate, including re-selling the purchased property for a higher price. Developing your virtual land, and renting your property can also become a decent source of income. People looking to host a virtual concert or an E-sports competition would gladly pay some kind of fee to rent out a virtual property that has already been developed to fit their needs."}},{"id":"ai_faoPhS7","type":"header","data":{"text":"Create and Earn on XANA","level":2}},{"id":"tKt7hV3RWV","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Not all metaverses empower users to generate an income through their creativity. XANA is a metaverse that enables user-generated content and encourages users to come up with multiple earning opportunities because of its decentralized system. This is just the beginning of the metaverse, and in the coming years it will drastically improve our lives just like the first iteration of the internet did many years ago."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

The team is building the first tokenization layer that celebrates Food in Web3 - creating an immersive & gamified experience for users worldwide."}},{"id":"JiqONYtxdE","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"OneRare is creating the first Foodverse on the blockchain - a Foodie's paradise in every way. https://source.matr1x.io/paper/litepaper_EN01.pdf

MATR1X FIRE: The first mobile FPS game in the metaverse and also the first game on the Matr1x platform. By playing the game, you can win NFTs and digital art assets with significant appreciation potential, such as profile pictures, weapons, PFPs, gloves, and other items.

Matr1x FIRE is the first metaverse mobile shooting game, focusing on PvP multiplayer fair competition, while providing classic 5v5 combats, Battle Royale mode, strategic casual PvE battles, etc. Matr1x FIRE will deliver lots of valuable differentiated NFTs: PFPs, avatars, weapons, gloves, and privileges. Matr1x FIRE has attracted over 63k registered players since Sep 2022, with 1/3 from taptap.io. Several rounds of online game tests will start from Feb to Jun 2023, in which more people can truly experience Matr1x FIRE online.

Completed its A round investment of 10 million USD in 2022, Matr1x has received financing from Hana Financial Investment (Korea’s second largest financial group), Hashkey Capital (early-stage investors of ETH), Amber, Seven X, and other well-known venture capitals.

All members of Matr1x’s founder team have had experience in world-class mobile game companies, engaging in the development and launching of over 10 mega games with a total project flow of over USD 3 billion and active users of around 100 million. The team also has game distribution experience on the global market. Currently, the team is located in South Korea, Japan, USA, Singapore, and Hong Kong.

items.excerpt: Matr1x is an integrated Web3 entertainment platform embracing games, NFT art, Esports, online literature, and community. We aim to unite the zeal of games and form an alliance of Web3 game lovers together.

data.text: Digital Sovereignty (Play and own)
As a native Web3 game, community players truly own the game items and props and can freely trade and share their earnings
Classical mobile shooting gameplay

We focus on the strategy and teamwork of the game, players need precise shooting skills, strategic thinking, teamwork to achieve victory; allowing players to personalize their tactics according to their preferences and situations
Co-creation of worldview stories

Through the creation of 1 million words worldview background fiction, Matr1x has built a fascinating game world and rich story background, and co-created it with the community. This is how we hope to build a native Web3 IP.
Exquisite game graphics
MATR1X FIRE focuses on the exquisite degree of game graphics, using advanced graphics technology and visual effects to bring the community players the ultimate game graphics
Free to Play

Game players can experience it as smoothly as Web2 games; no need to acquire NFT or assets. Players will randomly get digital asset rewards. Players only need to have NFT assets if they want to get higher level rewards.
Web3 Tournament ecology（Esports to own）
Hold unique Web3 Esports events, in-game competitive tournaments, live platform mini-tournaments, regional tournaments, and professional tournaments.
From the community, to the community

Matr1x FIRE will always be built around the community, which will be involved in the important DAO governance process, with most of the proceeds going back to the community. We will offer features such as shared editor for the community to co-create.
Asset diversity and decentralized distribution

MATR1X FIRE assets include Matr1× 2061 assets running on the ETH main-net, as well as in-game NFT assets that are available across games, tradable, and all built by players (not sold and priced on the official website)
PvP Mode 1: 5v5 Team Match Mode

Both teams enter to start the game of which task is to kill enemies of the opposite team. Players can immediately resurrect after being killed. Killing an enemy earns points for the team and the team that reaches the target point wins.
MATR1X FIRE : The First Gameplay Reveal
PvP Mode 2: 5v5 Team Competitive Mode

Players need to allocate their in-game resources to acquire weapons or equipment at the very beginning of the round. Players earn extra resources and round victory by eliminating the opposing team or fulfilling the missions. Players win the tournament by accumulating round victories.
The core of the economic system contains: asset definition, asset output, token definition, token production and consumption relationship, this document is a brief introduction to the above:
Asset classification
- FIRE Token: in-game tokens with unlimited supply; increases with the number of players and are used for various consuming mechanisms in the game, such as avatar reproduction, case opening
- MAX Token : Matr1x platform governance token with a fixed total supply of 1 billion
- Avatar NFT : The miner used to obtain FIRE Coin and cases in matches
- Case NFT: Can be opened up the cases to obtain rare in-game NFTs
Acquisition and Consumption paths
- Matches: PVP and PVE gameplays; players with advanced avatars can get FIRE token and              cases in the matches
- Avatar upgrade: enhance your avatar's attributes by consuming FIRE token and other avatars        to increase the in-game output efficiency
- Avatar Reproduction: New avatars are produced by extracting the genetic profiles of two              avatars, and avatar production mainly consumes FIRE token
- Case-opening: case-opening for in-game props consumes USDC and FIRE token
- Gun synthesis: create higher quality firearms by synthesis of equal lower quality firearms

items.features_text: {"time":1670226282282,"blocks":[{"id":"-wQp_vThXx","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"SecondLive Features"}},{"id":"8U1rhnCsgW","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"As the most active realistic style Metaverse on BNB Chain, SecondLive focuses on building social networks and supporting creator economic activities. Among various Metaverse projects, SecondLive stands out with following features:"}},{"id":"J-YNw7nASr","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1. Strong Carrying Capacity. SecondLive was designed to start with a PC client rather than a dapp on a webpage. It allows SecondLive to be able to accommodate up to 10k concurrent users to satisfy large-scale event. In April of 2022, SecondLive successfully held American rap star Quavo’s Metaverse debut, becoming the one and the only project that enabled 5k concurrent users to enjoy live show in the virtual stadium."}},{"id":"i1brNL8xRJ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"2. Extensive Application Scenarios. SecondLive is a rarely realistic style Metaverse. The scenario of SecondLive is approximately equal to that of the real world. Entering SecondLive is entering the era of \"Digital Species\". When Metaverse goes more into our daily life some day in the future, the realistic style is easier to be widely accepted and used."}},{"id":"j9cmUoplwQ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"3. Sustainable Commercial Mode. SecondLive chose the entertainment industry as a starting point to connect with the non-crypto world. As a successful first step, SecondLive engaged Quavo with 46 million fans and achieved more than 52k live stream viewers in 30 minutes show, which is a record-breaking on Binance Live."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1670226629902,"blocks":[{"id":"bgdYHhmUvT","type":"header","data":{"text":"Jigsaw Puzzles Game","level":2}},{"id":"3mh4n0Uyo4","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Introduction"}},{"id":"zjrTJBfniL","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Jigsaw Puzzles Game is an embedded functional module in Space. data.text: GameFi.org is a one-stop destination for web3 gaming. We aim to build digital communities and manage virtual economies for mainstream adoption. GameFi.org offers a suite of solutions covering the entire games and gamified projects' lifecycle, following a vision of one digital platform, and one virtual identity requiring zero blockchain knowledge.
The GameFi.org ecosystem includes Launchpad, Game Hub, Marketplace, Earn and Save, Guild Hub, Game Pass, and Party.
GameFi launchpad: One of the leading gaming platforms conducting Initial Gaming Offering (IGO) for game projects to get first access to game assets and engage with gamers in the GameFi.org community.
👉🏻 See more: https://gamefi.org/igo

Game Hub (former Aggregator): A listing page of the industry’s most creative blockchain games, where players, investors, and traders can receive in-depth information about their game modes, game studios, whitepapers, tokenomics as well as planned IGO events.
👉🏻 See more: https://gamefi.org/discovery
Marketplace:GameFi.org Marketplace is the destination for everyone to browse, collect and trade NFT items from various collections of games & metaverse projects, updating in real-time.
👉🏻 See more: https://gamefi.org/marketplace

GameFi Earn: GameFi Earn is a one-stop service allowing users to earn interest on crypto savings. It offers different types of funds, including Flexible and Fixed pools with competitive interest rates.
👉🏻 See more: https://gamefi.org/earn
Guild Hub: Guild Hub is a center where GameFi.org presents to users descriptions of valuable gaming guilds in the blockchain industry and updates on their scholarship programs.
👉🏻 See more: https://gamefi.org/guilds
GAMEFI LAUNCHPAD

GameFi.org debuted in September of 2021 with the initial function to serve as an all-encompassing hub supporting game finance, serving game studios, players, traders, and investors in one place. As one of the core features, GameFi Launchpad is the ultimate destination for investors to participate in initial sale events for tokens and in-game NFTs of the projects.

The team has accomplished many milestones with their noteworthy launching service during the early development days of game finance, marking GameFi Launchpad as one of the platforms with the highest return on investment (ROI).
Explore:
GameFi Launchpad Series - Part 2: The Procedure of Project Onboarding
GameFi Launchpad Series - Part 3: The Criteria of Project Selection
HOW DO WE DEMONSTRATE GAMEFI LAUNCHPAD?

GameFi.org, here and now defines itself as an all-in-one discovery hub for games and metaverses, aiming to build digital communities and manage virtual economies for mainstream adoption. The team has constantly been upgrading and expanding their platform, adjusting to the growth of games and metaverse's market share in cryptocurrency.
At the moment, GameFi Launchpad conducts two primary services for the projects:
Initial Game Offerings (IGO): An IGO is a type of crowdfunding that allows investors to pre-purchase a game project’s tokens at its early development stage.
Initial NFT Offerings (INO): An INO is a type of crowdfunding that allows investors to pre-purchase a project’s NFTs at its early development stage.
Learn more about GameFi Launchpad:
7 STEPS TO JOIN THE INITIAL GAMING OFFERING (IGO) ON GAMEFI LAUNCHPAD
HOW TO STAKE / UNSTAKE $GAFI ON GAMEFI LAUNCHPAD?
WHAT ARE THE MISSIONS OF GAMEFI LAUNCHPAD?
As IGO and INO lower the entry barrier between projects and investors, GameFi Launchpad plays an important role throughout the GameFi.org ecosystem.

GameFi Launchpad allows investors to have the opportunity to purchase tokens and NFT assets at an early stage of a project, before they are made available to the public with higher prices and rising value. On the other hand, it also supports projects to conduct fundraising, engage with more users, and enhance their brand exposure among the GameFi.org community.
TO WHICH PRODUCT DOES GAMEFI LAUNCHPAD PROVIDE ITS LAUNCHING SERVICE?

In reality, early 2022 has witnessed an unimpressive number of crypto games with present active users when officially launching on the market. Noticing the audience's concern, GameFi Launchpad actively searches for genuine blockchain games, gamified projects, and metaverse project, spreading their ideas to the gaming community through IGO and INO launching services.

Despite the honor of launching proposals, the GameFi.org team is selectively bringing qualified projects to their launchpad users. Every project launching on GameFi Launchpad has to go through a scrutinized procedure to verify the project team's origin, legitimacy, innovation of the product, and capacity to accomplish their vision.
GAME HUB
A COMPLETE SOURCE OF INFORMATION AND EVERYONE'S FAVORITE DESTINATION

Because of the gaming market's rapid growth, which has resulted in a rising number of games and gamified projects, the current situation in the blockchain gaming sector is challenging for newcomers. In that case, the GameFi.org Game Hub is still on its way to convincing players and game investors that it is the ideal destination to learn about blockchain gaming.

Before making decisions, visitors to the Game Hub may undertake market research and then swiftly find and analyze game insights. Every game has a detailed page for players to review, discuss, and rate. Therefore, visitors will get an unbiased approach to the listed games and metaverses on GameFi.org.
With a significant upgrade in UI/UX design and mobile optimization, the Game Hub will bring an excellent appearance and a seamless experience on any device for every user to enjoy.
A BRIDGE CONNECTING INTERESTING GAMES TO AN ENTHUSIASTIC PLAYER COMMUNITY

By posting games and their information on the GameFi.org Game Hub, game developers will have the opportunity to increase the brand exposure and popularity of their games among more than one million GameFi.org members across all platforms.

In addition, GameFi.org's Partner Success team will help projects execute marketing and communication plans to the gaming community, from activities as simple as sharing, commenting, and rating to the execution of large-scale campaigns like airdrops, game demos, and events.

The Game Hub also serves as a portal for game creators to listen to and gather community feedback. Through Game Hub, they can also learn about the current situation of the game market to get a broader perspective of the industry, stay abreast of the most recent developments in game creation, and access resources to shape their game development strategy.
Game Hub is anticipated to become a new game publishing channel for game developers in the future, providing them with more opportunities to distribute their games to the general public.
A STEAM-LIKE PLATFORM FOR GAMES AND METAVERSES
Game players and investors can get a better picture of the blockchain gaming business as a whole with more details.

Visitors may still filter and search for games by their IGO Status, Game Version Release Status, or Game Category. In addition, upon entering a specific game page, there are different types of information to discover.

The GameFi.org Game Hub is a one-stop destination where visitors may discover games and gamified projects applying blockchain technology to play, invest in, or learn about them. In the upcoming months, the GameFi.org team will continue to solicit users' feedback to enhance the Game Hub and list more game projects aiming to cover the whole blockchain gaming industry.
👉🏻 See more: https://gamefi.org/earn
Guild Hub: Guild Hub is a center where GameFi.org presents to users descriptions of valuable gaming guilds in the blockchain industry and updates on their scholarship programs.
👉🏻 See more: https://gamefi.org/guilds

items.name: The Sandbox
items.introduction: {"time":1664867581709,"blocks":[{"id":"Urdnn3eL-6","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The Sandbox is a decentralised, community-driven gaming ecosystem where creators can share and monetise voxel assets and gaming experiences on the Ethereum blockchain."}},{"id":"_fva2o5VTY","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Using The Sandbox's free software, such as VoxEdit and the Game Maker, players, artists and game designers can create ASSETs and experiences, such as games, dioramas and art galleries, for themselves and to share with others. These can be monetised to earn the creator passive income."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.excerpt: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences in the Ethereum blockchain using SAND, the platform’s utility token.
items.features_text: {"time":1664867833024,"blocks":[{"id":"s9uz1qj5T9","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The Sandbox gaming ecosystem consists of three integrated products that together provide a comprehensive experience for user-generated content (UGC) content production."}},{"id":"S7cCBxPPAE","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"A. VOXEDIT: "}},{"id":"-0w3t3kLBp","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"This simple to use yet powerful free 3D voxel modelling package allows users to create and animate 3D objects such as people, animals, foliage, and tools, and export them into The Sandbox marketplace to become game ASSETS."}},{"id":"-r8fT3mKfe","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"B. MARKETPLACE: "}},{"id":"9Ooq_eo2V7","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The Sandbox’s web-based marketplace allows users to upload, publish, and sell their creations (ASSETS) made in VoxEdit, as Tokens (Both ERC-721 and ERC-1155 tokens)."}},{"id":"6jkqpECppO","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"C. GAME MAKER: "}},{"id":"Zmm5r0zeWM","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Anyone who owns ASSETS, either by making them in VoxEdit or purchasing them, can utilize them with the third and most important ecosystem product, the Game Maker and the Game itself. This product, when launched in Game Maker mode, enables users to place and use their ASSETS within a piece of LAND (an ERC-721 token) that they can own in the virtual world."}},{"id":"v0r0Z2g3Kz","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Users can decorate their LAND with ASSETS, and more importantly, implement interesting and nuanced gameplay mechanics by assigning predefined behaviors to the ASSETS through visual scripting nodes, turning a LAND from a decoration experience into a potential full game experience."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.play_mode: {"time":1664868367296,"blocks":[{"id":"wmwOa3_sWO","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"At its core, The Sandbox is an ecosystem for Players and Creators, consisting of three main components: a Voxel Editor (named “VoxEdit”), a Marketplace, and the Game itself."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1664868267372,"blocks":[{"id":"qJMnQfNsvf","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"From time to time there may be events, activities and contests in which players will be able to earn or win $SAND tokens or Non-Fungible Tokens (such as ASSETs or LAND). Take a look below at some of the events you could be involved in and potentially earn these tokens from."}},{"id":"RwBAtmdHvf","type":"header","data":{"text":"Earning $SAND","level":2}},{"id":"8MSPg5qs17","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Create and Sell Voxel ASSETs on The Sandbox Marketplace"}},{"id":"7oGKYnrrJl","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Voxel artists can create ASSETs using The Sandbox's voxel art program, VoxEdit. These ASSETs can then be sold on The Sandbox's marketplace for $SAND."}},{"id":"P-eD2u8e6H","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Create, Share and Monetise Experiences on LAND"}},{"id":"37-C2iWACp","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Using the Game Maker software, you can create experiences, such as games, which can be published onto LANDs and then monetised. For example, players could pay a small fee in $SAND to be able to play your game."}},{"id":"niqGbeo9n6","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Renting out your LAND"}},{"id":"u6gkLZwzGb","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"LAND owners will be able to rent out any LANDs that they own. "}},{"id":"XkENZMi4-j","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Ambassador Program"}},{"id":"ED3OaDwmqn","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The Ambassador Program is a group of loyal, helpful and very knowledgable community members who help out by answering user's questions, making videos, writing articles, translating articles, spreading official Sandbox news on social media and so on. items.name: Step App
items.introduction: {"time":1655905490072,"blocks":[{"id":"dg6ptGsDRr","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Take your fitness habits and aspirations to the next level. Socialize. Compete. Enrich. Step App is a protocol for FitFi, the next frontier in crypto adoption. The first project built on this protocol is a gamified step app. You and your metaverse avatar advance together through filling daily fitness quests and PvP challenges. The protocol SDK allows others to build on this metaverse, creating a multi-product economy for the world's health aspirations. Step App's celebrity-endorsed augmented reality tech merges the metaverse with the physical world. Its gamified mechanics allow people to earn and compete. The integration with a metaverse creates immersion and excitement. The growth and adoption is led by strong partnerships with global athletes, global fitness influencers, and even brands."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.excerpt: Take your fitness habits and aspirations to the next level. Socialize. Compete. Enrich. Step App is a protocol for FitFi, the next frontier in crypto adoption. The first project built on this protocol is a gamified step app. You and your metaverse avatar advance together through filling daily fitness quests and PvP challenges.
items.features_text: {"time":1655905512167,"blocks":[{"id":"Fti2yNXp5H","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Step App is built around an essential daily activity for most people – moving around. Step App is the first application on the move2earn protocol, built by the core team on its own Avalanche subnet. FitFi is at the cross-section of making the physical and the digital; it’s a culmination of a very physical experience (fitness) within the metaverse, through the use of NFTs and geo-location technology. Augmented reality for better immersion is an added feature of Step’s FitFi metaverse."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1655905521509,"blocks":[{"id":"t9q2houh_u","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The move2earn: protocol works as follows:"}},{"id":"4bpdf-A265","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1. Minting: SNEAKs can be minted only with KCAL tokens."}},{"id":"wx1fj2BbLC","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"2. Earn: Running while staking SNEAK NFTs earns KCAL."}},{"id":"SlzJ52-HCb","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"3. Staking: All SNEAKs must be staked to earn KCAL. The earned KCAL is issued in epochs of 10 days. Unstaking before the KCAL is claimed burns the pending KCAL."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

items.name: Delysium
items.introduction: {"time":1655574018603,"blocks":[{"id":"aUAV6QYXjT","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Delysium is the World's First Playable AAA open-world MMO blockchain game, with massive AI-powered virtual beings distributed throughout the experience created and owned by the players. This is the Genesis design for the whole Delysium world, including its gameplay system, governance system, economic systems, and the detailed logic behind its core experience. It's built with Unreal Engine 5. "}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

items.features_text: {"time":1655574053186,"blocks":[{"id":"6Bo9MmldGd","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Features such as cyberpunk style, open-world, MMORPG, and UGC will offer abundant gameplay and experience in Delysium. "}},{"id":"eApQHvplZR","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"# 1. Players' Perspective"}},{"id":"xMnmqiGvMI","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"- First-person view"}},{"id":"RGMvgc-TE7","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"- Third-person view (default)"}},{"id":"2E1vLzuHaV","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"# 2. Core Interaction"}},{"id":"YK4cRHqCsz","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"- Combat    "}},{"id":"RytjQKETwV","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"- Shooting (aiming, waist shot, left and right probe, bunker probe...)    "}},{"id":"xX0HI6dYXo","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"- Strategy (throwing, posing...)"}},{"id":"iZ43pQqfHL","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"- Movement"}},{"id":"ziFiey5kq9","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"- Interaction (making dialogues, using items, customized animations...)"}},{"id":"_H68yy7_Dt","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"# 3. PVP, PVE and UGC editor represent Battle Mode, Adventure Mode and Creative Mode. PVP includes Casual PVP,  Official PVP Tournaments and Open-PVP. The mechanism behind Open-PVP is a bit complicated."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

items.name: MetaOasis
items.introduction: {"time":1655887550628,"blocks":[{"id":"b-jficZ6jh","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"MetaOasis is a next-generation game publishing platform focused on interlinking web2 and web3. Fully considering the present reality of gamers and developers, MetaOasis energizes the game products in all respects, and a prosperous and highly-interconnected ecosystem built for providing users an easy access and smooth learning curve to Web. 3 world. "}},{"id":"bRt6aaqPu4","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"MetaOasis CH (Celestial Heaven) is a main game world based on the METAOASIS platform and a sci-fi themed MMOSLG game. CH, as a new generation of GAME-FI, optimizes the economic model of traditional chain games and entry threshold. The game is free to play, allowing free players to enjoy the game and P2E through hard work."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.excerpt: MetaOasis CH (Celestial Heaven) is a main game world based on the METAOASIS platform and a sci-fi themed MMOSLG game. CH, as a new generation of GAME-FI, optimizes the economic model of traditional chain games and entry threshold. The game is free to play, allowing free players to enjoy the game and P2E through hard work.
items.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1655578084704,"blocks":[{"id":"zIXGe8jXFj","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"There are ways to play the game, each with its own unique P2E mode."}},{"id":"AMsj7YsPYS","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The gatherers:"}},{"id":"Up9i2h8MGu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Players can collect rare resources and deal on the market to earn rewards."}},{"id":"5vGPLnCmJO","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The producers:"}},{"id":"Wb3fj4LGFo","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Players can produce a variety of combat NFTs and sell them on the market for a reward."}},{"id":"02K60nmukP","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The fighters:"}},{"id":"CaNW2l2RaN","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Players can fight at dangerous wormholes and special spaces, acquire uncommon technical blueprints and other loots, which can be sold on the market for a reward."}},{"id":"vN4YyC52j9","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Guilds and organizations:"}},{"id":"9M8TdPLmW8","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Complete the core mission of the season in the game, compete for the qualification to enter the \"Oasis\", and finally get a huge season reward."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

items.name: Victoria VR
items.introduction: {"time":1672825091865,"blocks":[{"id":"DMrglBP0m2","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Victoria VR is the first Blockchain-based MMORPG in Virtual Reality with Realistic Graphics built on Unreal Engine, created and owned by its users. It is a universal platform that will connect games, decentralized applications, and virtual realities - a Metaverse"}},{"id":"64WS5a9pHG","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Our revolutionary development, the combination of the latest generation of emerging technologies, a highly skilled, experienced and competent team together with strong, market leading strategic partners, means we are now able to offer users an experience unlike anything ever seen before."}},{"id":"Lti80D-1RO","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We have designed Victoria VR from the ground up with our citizens empowered to build and develop the future of the world themselves, with the world evolving and living without its original creators."}},{"id":"fxpp3mz-do","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Built on the blockchain all assets whether received in the game or directly created by the users are registered on the blockchain as NFT’s. Citizens will be able to build, create and securely trade both in and out of world NFT’s securely within The Big Market VR."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.excerpt:
Victoria VR is the first Blockchain-based
MMORPG in Virtual Reality with Realistic
Graphics built on Unreal Engine, created
and owned by its users.

items.name: Health Hero
items.introduction: {"time":1668665836194,"blocks":[{"id":"5bke05uevm","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Health Hero is a health-to-earn game that allows users to earn our native utility token $HLTHY which unlocks access to free healthcare and healthy food when they own a Go!Bot and start earning the token. Users have access to purchase a W-NFT that allows them to own their own digital eletrconics wellness record and be able to use it to unlock other mini-games within the platform for even greater $HLTHY rewards."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.excerpt: Health Hero is a health-to-earn game that allows users to earn our native utility token $HLTHY which unlocks access to free healthcare and healthy food when they own a Go!Bot and start earning the token.
items.features_text: {"time":1668665854559,"blocks":[{"id":"V8VU01Sd6k","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Health-to-earn - allows users to upload screenshots or photos of healthy activities and receive XP for them. It also allows users to upload grocery receipts and be able to earn $HLTHY cash back for healthy items on the receipt (user only earns $HLTHY if he/she owns a Go!Bot)."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

items.name: X World Games
items.roadmap_text: {"time":1669111248880,"blocks":[{"id":"D1FGF2rmvY","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/X_world_games_road_map_eed72b6c64.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":67.25,"alt":"X world games_road map.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/large_X_world_games_road_map_eed72b6c64.png","hash":"large_X_world_games_road_map_eed72b6c64","mime":"image/png","name":"large_X world games_road map.png","path":null,"size":102.31,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/small_X_world_games_road_map_eed72b6c64.png","hash":"small_X_world_games_road_map_eed72b6c64","mime":"image/png","name":"small_X world games_road map.png","path":null,"size":37.58,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/medium_X_world_games_road_map_eed72b6c64.png","hash":"medium_X_world_games_road_map_eed72b6c64","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_X world games_road map.png","path":null,"size":68.12,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/thumbnail_X_world_games_road_map_eed72b6c64.png","hash":"thumbnail_X_world_games_road_map_eed72b6c64","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_X world games_road map.png","path":null,"size":13.46,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.introduction: {"time":1669102484581,"blocks":[{"id":"1zexE97TzD","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Founded in 2018, X World Games (“XWG”) aims to build the next-gen decentralized gaming metaverse."}},{"id":"qUkHzfzV--","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"X World Games' vision is to build a diversified gaming ecosystem that connects traditional gamers with the blockchain world and invite more game developers into the crypto space by creating and providing the underlying blockchain framework."}},{"id":"Gv4Epnvp_x","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"With its gaming innovation, crypto game - Dream Card & Hero Card, Metaverse entertainment - Dream Idols, NFT Marketplace and DeFi Pool, X World Games now serves over 2 million registered gamers, and has quickly become the fastest-growing crypto gaming platform in the ecosystem."}},{"id":"IqKpKBqsT5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"X World Games is headquartered in Singapore with a 100+ dynamic team located worldwide. "}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.excerpt: X World Games' vision is to build a diversified gaming ecosystem that connects traditional gamers with the blockchain world and invite more game developers into the crypto space by creating and providing the underlying blockchain framework.
items.features_text: {"time":1668485962782,"blocks":[{"id":"tyofTsvZZn","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Decentralization"}},{"id":"9yX7poJKGM","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"True decentralized ownership of a gaming world via DAO. Players that hold XWG tokens get to decide the governance policy or the next in-game development for the ecosystem, including reward mechanisms and tokenomic systems."}},{"id":"mtajTdSLY3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":" Creation & Collection"}},{"id":"cExIOeocq6","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Players can create all kinds of in-game items, from unique avatars to fantasy equipment. All in-game items will be tokenized and represented by NFTs, and all assets can be traded through an open decentralized marketplace."}},{"id":"O8tlYhxAkv","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Global Community"}},{"id":"ZFjOmpdUn1","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"XWG is powered by a global community, made up of gamers, investors, and creators, to build an immersive multiplayer experience and balanced ecosystem."}},{"id":"2Vg6X409Iq","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Cross-Game Experience "}},{"id":"f0UTC0d-mg","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Enjoy different games in one open metaverse via cross-game experience. Players truly own their characters and sets, and experience their unique assets in every different game of the X World."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.play_mode: {"time":1669103039719,"blocks":[{"id":"TAjibDZUmu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Dream Card V1"}},{"id":"a38Jb03ldR","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The first gaming product released on the X World Games platform was \"Dream Card\", also known as, \"Dream Card V1\". It was the first series of collectible trading cards issued by X World Games and the first global Japanese ACG-style NFT based TCG game. The number of players with TCG games currently exceeds 60 million gamers."}},{"id":"EpEdPblFQB","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Dream Card V1, the minimum viable product version of Dream Card, which mainly focuses on PVP gameplay, contains all the basic and functional elements of a crypto trading card game, such as a level & rarity system, character growth, ELO ranking, passive skills, and NFT staking & trading. Dream Card v1 was successfully launched in June 2021 and attracted more than 1 million+ players globally."}},{"id":"wCfkreDxAC","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Dream Card V2"}},{"id":"0C5iGZo53S","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Dream Card V2 is a multi-player RPG game built by Unity, Reloaded Featuring PvE mode with new Heroes and NFTs."}},{"id":"Zaja5x9v_S","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"It's the next upgrade version of Dream Card series, will be running parallel to Dream Card v1 and mainly focus on PvE gameplay. Players can play against computer AIs, passing through levels and beating the final Boss. The combat animation and special effects will be upgraded to the mobile gaming standard, which is different from the current Dream Card v1. More game modes will be developed for better game experience and retention. "}},{"id":"DvfWHuiMVB","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Hero Card"}},{"id":"uppAqJPx4Z","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"A Play-to-Earn Matching Card Game"}},{"id":"-egNNJJfP8","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Hero Card is a third-party-produced play-to-earn game being launched on the X World Games platform. The release of Hero Card brings a new set of professionally drawn and beautifully designed Japanese anime-style art to the NFT cards for gamers to collect, play and earn $XWG! "}},{"id":"JAh87XdrDS","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The gameplay of Hero Card is heavily inspired by the well-known card game “Rummy” but with the added twist of earning $XWG tokens through regular gameplay. Players will compete as individuals in matchmade group battles with the goal of obtaining a matching pair of Hero Cards in your hand. Once a player has three of the same Hero Cards in their hand, they win! "}},{"id":"ae2dgOYBJY","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"One of the best features of play-to-earn games is the ability for players to monetize their own time spent playing a game. In Hero Card, the play-to-earn aspect takes centerstage by allowing players to win $XWG regardless of whether they win or lose a match in Hero Card."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1669778021564,"blocks":[{"id":"OLSvsQYCmQ","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/X_World_Games_Token_Earning_Flow_min_1_1_min_4e7936deeb.jpg","mime":"image/jpeg","height":7626,"width":5760,"size":1017.2,"alt":"X World Games Token Earning Flow-min (1) (1)-min.jpg","formats":{"large":{"ext":".jpg","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/large_X_World_Games_Token_Earning_Flow_min_1_1_min_4e7936deeb.jpg","hash":"large_X_World_Games_Token_Earning_Flow_min_1_1_min_4e7936deeb","mime":"image/jpeg","name":"large_X World Games Token Earning Flow-min (1) (1)-min.jpg","path":null,"size":100.63,"width":756,"height":1000},"small":{"ext":".jpg","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/small_X_World_Games_Token_Earning_Flow_min_1_1_min_4e7936deeb.jpg","hash":"small_X_World_Games_Token_Earning_Flow_min_1_1_min_4e7936deeb","mime":"image/jpeg","name":"small_X World Games Token Earning Flow-min (1) (1)-min.jpg","path":null,"size":33.74,"width":378,"height":500},"medium":{"ext":".jpg","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/medium_X_World_Games_Token_Earning_Flow_min_1_1_min_4e7936deeb.jpg","hash":"medium_X_World_Games_Token_Earning_Flow_min_1_1_min_4e7936deeb","mime":"image/jpeg","name":"medium_X World Games Token Earning Flow-min (1) (1)-min.jpg","path":null,"size":63.43,"width":567,"height":750},"thumbnail":{"ext":".jpg","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/thumbnail_X_World_Games_Token_Earning_Flow_min_1_1_min_4e7936deeb.jpg","hash":"thumbnail_X_World_Games_Token_Earning_Flow_min_1_1_min_4e7936deeb","mime":"image/jpeg","name":"thumbnail_X World Games Token Earning Flow-min (1) (1)-min.jpg","path":null,"size":5.48,"width":118,"height":156}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

items.name: ERTHA
items.introduction: {"time":1655708331210,"blocks":[{"id":"LqMcH9QhdP","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"ERTHA is Heroes Of Might And Magic game-type inspired economic, social, MMO game based on exploring and investigating the world, levelling up, choosing specialisations, and increasing the strength of your character, company and country.The game is designed to replicate a real-life environment, simulating the actions that people have to perform to earn a living.Ertha's Globe consists of 360,000 HEX Land Plots, and each can be owned as an NFT.\n\nBinance Smart Chain based in-game currencies: ERTHA TOKEN & ERTHA LAND NFTIn ERTHA, players are able to acquire virtual land plot NFTs called \"HEXs\" or \"HEX\", through which there are many possible transactions that earn HEX owners cash-back in Ertha tokens:"}},{"id":"Y1zIVuWJ-9","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Employment Tax (Salary portion that is paid by the employer)","Sales Tax (Purchase tax when buying goods from the market)","Company Fees (Company building, repairs, upgrades)","Company Revenue (Sold items, job contract fines, penalty taxes)","Warehouse Fees (Warehouse building and upgrades)","Delivery Fees (Delivering goods to a specific warehouse within an owned HEX)","Airfare Fees (Flight tickets)"]}},{"id":"HsYko5dHnt","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/1_38cd382659.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":375.26,"alt":"1.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/large_1_38cd382659.png","hash":"large_1_38cd382659","mime":"image/png","name":"large_1.png","path":null,"size":460.63,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/small_1_38cd382659.png","hash":"small_1_38cd382659","mime":"image/png","name":"small_1.png","path":null,"size":142.04,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/medium_1_38cd382659.png","hash":"medium_1_38cd382659","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_1.png","path":null,"size":275.9,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/thumbnail_1_38cd382659.png","hash":"thumbnail_1_38cd382659","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_1.png","path":null,"size":46.32,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"bcZQB-V6u2","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Backstory"}},{"id":"lbIBXxgRPJ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Since the dawn of time, humankind has had to preserve itself on this planet. It had to fight different kinds of enemies, but the most dangerous of all of them came to be humans themselves. So, the wars for land, well-being and power ravaged the planet for ages. Wars changed their faces and humans fought for different kinds of reasons. Recently, for a brief moment, it seemed like peace and harmony had taken over the planetary routine. Politics at this point looked to have evolved to the level where humans do not have to resort to the extremes of killing each other."}},{"id":"lnfD2EJwgw","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"But, the economical side of homo sapiens ' existence became the kind of war that no one had foreseen. Since journalism and the media are owned by corporations, all the information about disasters and wrong-doings instigated by them all over the planet is carefully managed and provided for the masses to consume as intended."}},{"id":"qyunnu_WVS","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/2_798ae62c9c.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":512.31,"alt":"2.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/large_2_798ae62c9c.png","hash":"large_2_798ae62c9c","mime":"image/png","name":"large_2.png","path":null,"size":592.75,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/small_2_798ae62c9c.png","hash":"small_2_798ae62c9c","mime":"image/png","name":"small_2.png","path":null,"size":159.24,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/medium_2_798ae62c9c.png","hash":"medium_2_798ae62c9c","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_2.png","path":null,"size":346.26,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/thumbnail_2_798ae62c9c.png","hash":"thumbnail_2_798ae62c9c","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_2.png","path":null,"size":41.06,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"F9Qk4uY99b","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Some of the real news broke out from time to time through the effort of different groups of activists. Truth is leaked via dangerous endeavours of computer hackers. For unveiling atrocious lies that corporations are feeding the consumers, they are treated with utter disrespect, portrayed as the enemies of humankind and brought down using corrupt law enforcement institutions who allegedly have an obligation to protect the citizens, but did become a part of an enormous human control machine that no one has seen to this day."}},{"id":"vtCwuTmxDC","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"So, the mortal story continues without interruption, and the suffering of the people is a never-ending tale of human civilization."}},{"id":"goPaWHEvuB","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Yet fighting is not even close to the end. War needs a reason to exist, and humans are very good at providing it with justifications to continue."}},{"id":"R9IWz6AlYw","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Planet “Earth” is becoming extremely overpopulated and those finite resources our fragile universe marble has in store for us are becoming more and more scarce. This is where today's war found its reason to start and prevail indefinitely."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
items.excerpt: ERTHA is a Strategic, Metaverse, play-and-learn as well as P2E game that has real player driven economy, wars and politics.
items.features_text:
{"time":1655710601103,"blocks":[{"id":"IMld7mMjcQ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1. MAP VIEW"}},{"id":"La1so0mHDi","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"At first, when Ertha world was created, its map looked the same as the one once existed. Everything started with the original country borders. The majority of Ertha’s population is always on the move. They travel around the land to explore and find valuable resources, studies, items on sale and places to express themselves. Erthians are not locked into their motherland. To travel wherever they decide to, have to acquire traveling visas."}},{"id":"IYwuDjzbKz","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/1_7e67935d7a.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":396.79,"alt":"1.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/large_1_7e67935d7a.png","hash":"large_1_7e67935d7a","mime":"image/png","name":"large_1.png","path":null,"size":527.29,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/small_1_7e67935d7a.png","hash":"small_1_7e67935d7a","mime":"image/png","name":"small_1.png","path":null,"size":151.13,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/medium_1_7e67935d7a.png","hash":"medium_1_7e67935d7a","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_1.png","path":null,"size":315.97,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/thumbnail_1_7e67935d7a.png","hash":"thumbnail_1_7e67935d7a","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_1.png","path":null,"size":41.92,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"p7-77OyBHV","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"MAP FEATURES"}},{"id":"z8JJdsm_k6","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Countries borders are volatile","Find resources, studies, jobs via map
","Travel to the farthest corners of the world
","Explore and find various points of interest
","Find other players to cooperate or compete with
","A map is the face of Erthas dynamic change
"]}},{"id":"VncRCLOVcw","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"2. HOME"}},{"id":"Tv0PZ29znJ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The residence is the safest place for every player. Players cannot be assaulted while staying in them. Additional residences can be bought and placed in any free land plot, or they can be rented from other players while traveling. Residences provide bonuses to the players like faster energy and health regeneration, etc. Residences can be upgraded and furnished, what impacts how they are visualized in the game. It is one more way for a player to show off his social status in Ertha world."}},{"id":"F55aiEoKwt","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/2_56feb11549.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":175.79,"alt":"2.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/large_2_56feb11549.png","hash":"large_2_56feb11549","mime":"image/png","name":"large_2.png","path":null,"size":198.92,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/small_2_56feb11549.png","hash":"small_2_56feb11549","mime":"image/png","name":"small_2.png","path":null,"size":57.87,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/medium_2_56feb11549.png","hash":"medium_2_56feb11549","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_2.png","path":null,"size":119.4,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/thumbnail_2_56feb11549.png","hash":"thumbnail_2_56feb11549","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_2.png","path":null,"size":17.13,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"bevsHCPF3Z","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"RESIDENCE KEY POINTS"}},{"id":"oklcQ2kECw","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["The first residence is provided for free to every player","A player can buy or rent other residences all around the world
","A player can build a residence in the place of his choosing
","Residences are upgradable
","Being in a residence increase energy and health regeneration
"]}},{"id":"R-y7mIPx3F","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"3. GRID VIEW"}},{"id":"ImNuWwEYJ1","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The map of Ertha is divided into hexagons – home of smaller communities of players. Every hexagon represents a certain region of once existed real map. The map includes every property built in each hexagon, including universities, military training camps, markets and other institutions needed for Erthians. Next to the countrywide chat, every hexagon has its separate chat channel. Advertising your merchandise and services or just chatting with other players with the hope to make new friends is the best routine Erthian can wish for."}},{"id":"TINZEhD4jV","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/3_0ec6338105.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":826.21,"alt":"3.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/large_3_0ec6338105.png","hash":"large_3_0ec6338105","mime":"image/png","name":"large_3.png","path":null,"size":705.6,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/small_3_0ec6338105.png","hash":"small_3_0ec6338105","mime":"image/png","name":"small_3.png","path":null,"size":185.31,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/medium_3_0ec6338105.png","hash":"medium_3_0ec6338105","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_3.png","path":null,"size":405.4,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/thumbnail_3_0ec6338105.png","hash":"thumbnail_3_0ec6338105","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_3.png","path":null,"size":47.94,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"MigMZlhSB6","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"GRID FEATURES"}},{"id":"LZJvobXLCd","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Every hexagon has a property building limit","Each hexagon is unique and keeps dynamically changing
","Different buildings can be found here
","Explore and find various points of interest
","Some city hexagons have airports
","Shortcuts to ongoing missions are provided here
"]}},{"id":"gjfOKtQdT5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"4. BUILDING VIEW"}},{"id":"LZnJ-O-eIq","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Working is an essential part of the production process. Every employer in the game needs to find labor force, which is skilled enough to utilize factory machinery efficiently. Labor force can be used by employing other players using a job contract. A job contract is an agreement that allows a business owner and employee to exchange energy for money. Job contract has a number of criteria: contract type, duration, skills requirements, salary, and fine."}},{"id":"CvRKoSjcYR","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/4_deaeaabf43.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":665.37,"alt":"4.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/large_4_deaeaabf43.png","hash":"large_4_deaeaabf43","mime":"image/png","name":"large_4.png","path":null,"size":587.81,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/small_4_deaeaabf43.png","hash":"small_4_deaeaabf43","mime":"image/png","name":"small_4.png","path":null,"size":160.94,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/medium_4_deaeaabf43.png","hash":"medium_4_deaeaabf43","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_4.png","path":null,"size":343.59,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/thumbnail_4_deaeaabf43.png","hash":"thumbnail_4_deaeaabf43","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_4.png","path":null,"size":44.39,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"0i_KGfKTKh","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"JOB KEY POINTS"}},{"id":"g0nzN1JbBm","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Working consumes energy","There are different types of job contracts
","There are skill requirements for every job
","Job contracts are enforced with penalties
","Taking a job requires traveling to job location
","Working improves the skills used on the job
"]}},{"id":"OuZK_bDYhL","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"5. WAR"}},{"id":"axEBlVn4OV","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"War enables a country and its citizens to achieve their goals on a global scale. Inequity in scarce resources, territorial disputes are among the main causes of international conflicts. An aggressor country tries to conquer additional territory to increase its political and economical power in the region: gain access to additional natural resources, extra company construction sites, etc. Wars can also happen just for the sake of it, just because of a human factor. Erthians have full control over all international rivalry and have an ability to initiate wars as soon as their country becomes eligible for that. Country borders in Ertha is a far more volatile subject in comparison with the world once existed."}},{"id":"5LXkKBiHsa","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/5_1854f09171.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":471.6,"alt":"5.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/large_5_1854f09171.png","hash":"large_5_1854f09171","mime":"image/png","name":"large_5.png","path":null,"size":578.61,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/small_5_1854f09171.png","hash":"small_5_1854f09171","mime":"image/png","name":"small_5.png","path":null,"size":157.71,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/medium_5_1854f09171.png","hash":"medium_5_1854f09171","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_5.png","path":null,"size":339.62,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/thumbnail_5_1854f09171.png","hash":"thumbnail_5_1854f09171","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_5.png","path":null,"size":42.59,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"_tcXlTUIGB","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"PRODUCT COMPANY KEY POINTS"}},{"id":"iSBb51jUKd","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Countries borders are volatile","All citizens can participate in war
","Resources and additional construction sites instigate wars Typography
","Whole countries can be overtaken
","Wars happen for a fixed period of time through a series of smaller fights
"]}},{"id":"qCzw_jAZ45","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"6. POLITICS"}},{"id":"3nXQ3p5oFU","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Politically oriented players have an ability to become rulers of their country for a fixed period of time. In case of anarchy, they create gangs and, in case of democracy, political parties. Their reputation, track record as a businessman, warrior or scientist, and organizational skills will play a major role in achieving the position in parliament, becoming a minister or even a president. When in position of power, players have a responsibility of a successful money collection and its wise distribution. Budget plays an essential role when controlling the direction of country industries development, managing crime rate or restricting migration. In general, politicians will be able to turn the energy expenditures of the citizens in the desired direction. It is a hard venture to live through, so only those who are talented, skillful, and patient enough will endure this process."}},{"id":"9mhlR3Hs7S","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/6_9b72ce1813.png","mime":"image/png","height":1000,"width":2368,"size":769.56,"alt":"6.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/large_6_9b72ce1813.png","hash":"large_6_9b72ce1813","mime":"image/png","name":"large_6.png","path":null,"size":738.85,"width":1000,"height":422},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/small_6_9b72ce1813.png","hash":"small_6_9b72ce1813","mime":"image/png","name":"small_6.png","path":null,"size":204.87,"width":500,"height":211},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/medium_6_9b72ce1813.png","hash":"medium_6_9b72ce1813","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_6.png","path":null,"size":435.8,"width":750,"height":317},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://gamefi-cms.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/thumbnail_6_9b72ce1813.png","hash":"thumbnail_6_9b72ce1813","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_6.png","path":null,"size":54.2,"width":245,"height":103}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}},{"id":"bbE9kuPWZu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"POLITICS KEY POINTS"}},{"id":"x1ced6vJQV","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["There are different forms of government","In democracy citizens elect representatives to rule their country
","Politicians are responsible for taxation policy application
","Politicians are responsible for countries budget money distribution
","Smart country energy expenditure balanced through budget money distribution
"]}},{"id":"p-m1mX3HRL","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"7. ECONOMY"}},{"id":"1GZM1gqLY4","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":" Aside from the opportunity to buy in-game items from other players, there is an increasing number of features encouraging spending ERTHA tokens in the game for unique items, social status showoff, and packages for faster advancement in the game."}},{"id":"-CTfNqhR92","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Different types of purchases have diverse effects on the game. First of all, there are permanent virtual assets like extra property slots, exclusive products, blueprints private jets and others – once players bought them, they are theirs for good. Another type of purchases are temporary services such as protection from assaults, temporary boosters which, once bought, have meaningful, but temporary effect. Moreover, fast forwarding allows to skip waiting times when traveling, working, etc. for ERTHA tokens. Last, but not least, social show off features like 1-3 symbols nicknames or exclusive architecture mansions have an indirect effect on the gameplay and allow players to display their wealth. Since all of the premium features can be bought only for ERTHA tokens, the demand and value for the ERTHA token is increased."}},{"id":"RCf14zHye3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Ertha digital and real trading cards will be implemented into the game. Collecting them will yield players various rewards. Digital Ertha cards will represent different assets that players have in the game. Physical cards then will be bought for ERTHA tokens, traded between players and used to play Ertha collecting card game similar to “Magic The Gathering.”  "}},{"id":"sslTyc5qL5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"PREMIUM KEY POINTS"}},{"id":"AH-IeolsDg","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Temporary character protection. "]}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

Q4 of 2022: PuffGo Alpha Version, PuffTown V1, & FIFA Beta Version Release

Q3 of 2023: PuffLand
Q4 of 2023: PuffWorld Optimization

PuffGo is an on-chain multiplayer royale game that allows players to earn while having fun. The game contains several level themes and gameplay modes that offer players a choice of matchups from solo to multiplayer. Players can collect game characters with different appearances, personalities, abilities, and costumes. Players can also use different characters to participate in various levels of games and modes based on the advantages of each. Multiple skills and strategies matter when you compete with each other for higher ranking and better rewards.

The game has multiple main characters with distinguishable personalities and nonidentical appearances, each with their own story and customized skills or attributes that play to their strengths in different application scenarios.
